metadata.description: Discover the Olive Garden soup menu for September 2025. Explore our four classic soups, including the fan-favorite Zuppa Toscana, and find prices and calorie information.

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Olive Gardenâ€™s soup menu is all about comfort, warmth, and rich flavors. Every bowl is packed with fresh ingredients, that makes it a go-to choice for anyone craving a hearty meal.

SOUPS, SALAD & BREADSTICKS.description: Enjoy our famous unlimited breadsticks and garden salad, perfectly paired with a variety of hearty homemade soups.
SOUPS, SALAD & BREADSTICKS.recommended: WEEKDAY Lunch Special: Soup, Salad and Breadsticks

items.name: WEEKDAY Lunch Special: Soup, Salad and Breadsticks
items.review: The LEGENDARY deal. Unlimited breadsticks, salad, and your choice of homemade soup. It's the ultimate lunch hack. Pro-tip: dip the breadsticks in the Zuppa Toscana. You can thank me later. ðŸ˜‰

items.question: What soups are available at Olive Garden?
items.answer: Olive Garden offers four soups: Chicken & Gnocchi, Pasta e Fagioli, Minestrone, and Zuppa Toscana.

items.question: Can I get unlimited soup, salad, and breadsticks with my entrÃ©e?
items.answer: Yes, every entrÃ©e includes unlimited soup or salad and breadsticks.

items.question: Are the soups made fresh daily?
items.answer: Yes, all soups are prepared fresh every day.
